ai_generated_tags.description: This image showcases a modern minimalist prayer room with a central feature of a backlit marble wall. The dark wooden frame around the marble wall creates a contrast, while the flat wooden shelf below provides a clean, uncluttered look. The room embodies traditional Indian elements like the use of marble, which is often associated with purity and spirituality in Indian culture, while adopting a contemporary design approach.

metadata.budget_indicator: Moderate, as marble and polished wood are mid-range materials
metadata.indian_specific: Use of marble and wooden frame, reflecting Indian design aesthetics
